entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:38 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:38 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:38 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
